Caption: Mrs. Shanti Sengupto and other dignitaries during high tea
Description: In his interview with Prof. Ajit Kolar, Mr. R. Natarajan, the first Registrar of IIT Madras describes Mrs. Shanti Sengupto as “a gift to us”. He goes on to say that “as the first lady of the campus, she was very social, she didn’t have any airs about her”.
